element.name: Incident/Patient Disposition
element.definition: Type of disposition treatment and/or transport of the patient by this EMS Unit.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Dead at Scene-No Resuscitation Attempted (With Transport)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Dead at Scene-No Resuscitation Attempted (Without Transport)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Dead at Scene-Resuscitation Attempted (With Transport)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Dead at Scene-Resuscitation Attempted (Without Transport)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Treated, Transferred Care to Another EMS Unit

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Treated, Transported by Law Enforcement

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Patient Treated, Transported by Private Vehicle

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Standby-Public Safety, Fire, or EMS Operational Support Provided

asserts.assert: Cardiac Rhythm on Arrival at Destination should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Dead at Scene... (with Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit" and Cardiac Arrest is "Yes...".
Unit En Route Date/Time should be recorded unless Incident/Patient Disposition is "Canceled (Prior to Arrival At Scene)".
Unit Arrived on Scene Date/Time should be recorded unless Incident/Patient Disposition is "Canceled (Prior to Arrival At Scene)".
Arrived at Patient Date/Time should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient...".
Unit Left Scene Date/Time should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Patient Arrived at Destination Date/Time should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Destination Patient Transfer of Care Date/Time should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Patient's Home County should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Patient's Home State should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Patient's Home ZIP Code should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Gender should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient...".
Race should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Age should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient...".
Age Units should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient...".
Primary Method of Payment should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Incident Location Type should be recorded unless Incident/Patient Disposition is "Canceled (Prior to Arrival At Scene)".
Possible Injury should be recorded when Type of Service Requested is "911 Response (Scene)" and Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Chief Complaint Anatomic Location should be recorded when Type of Service Requested is "911 Response (Scene)" and Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Chief Complaint Organ System should be recorded when Type of Service Requested is "911 Response (Scene)" and Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Primary Symptom should be recorded when Type of Service Requested is "911 Response (Scene)" and Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Provider's Primary Impression should be recorded when Type of Service Requested is "911 Response (Scene)" and Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Initial Patient Acuity should be recorded when Type of Service Requested is "911 Response (Scene)" and Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Reason CPR/Resuscitation Discontinued should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient Dead at Scene-Resuscitation Attempted..."
Destination State should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Destination County should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Destination ZIP Code should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
EMS Transport Method should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Transport Mode from Scene should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Final Patient Acuity should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Reason for Choosing Destination should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Type of Destination should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "... (With Transport)" or "Patient Treated, Transported by this EMS Unit".
Cause of Injury should be recorded when Incident/Patient Disposition is "Patient..." and Possible Injury is "Yes".
